                              :op1 "India")))
            :op2 (t / tribute
                  :poss a3
                  :beneficiary (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (k / kill-01
                              :ARG0 (a4 / attack-01
                                    :ARG1 (m / magazine
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "Charlie"
                                                :op2 "Ch Hebdo"))))))))
